name: Lovestory
description: Lovestory is a hurricane shoot 'em up 3D shooter with a large range of weapons and a huge number of enemies. Help the hero to blow a path, gaining the upper hand lot of corpses and tons of twisted metal to save his love.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or Later Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 or better; 512 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 670 MB available space
